name: The Transubstantiation of Kenji
description:
A short story set within the world of the Dead Letter Office of Somewhere, Ohio. It may not be all that clear, but I hope you can vibe with it on an unconscious level. 

(Have not tested the PC version, but the Mac version should work once unzipped and installed. I've literally never made any kind of game before, so it might be busted lol. Web version doesn't seem to work on mobile: I'm working on it).
